channel.title: 🔎 Forensic Investigation on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in 🔎 Forensic Investigation on Analyst

item.title: Investigation Process 🗒️
item.description: The Anatomy Of Investigation Identification/Assessment. Understand your scope (technical and legal aspects), your goals and people you are going to work with.

item.title: Data Collection 🤏
item.description: Logical Backup - doesn’t copy all, doesn’t copy slack, free space and deleted files. Imaging - bit-by-bit copy.

item.title: Collected Data Analysis 🔎
item.description: Image Info Use sleuthkit to gather some information. mmstat <disk_or_image> shows volume type. I’ve ran this command, but as I can conclude by the output, it’s not volume type, but rather a partition schema.
